ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE HDMI cable, and FREE 500 Ft RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
6 HD-SDI Cameras: 3*HD-SDI 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Camera, Progressive Scan, 1080P Video Output Mode, HD-SDI Video Output Level, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens, 30PCs IR LED;; 3*HD-SDI 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Camera, Progressive Scan, 1080P Video Output Mode, HD-SDIVideo Output Level, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens, 72PCs IR LED, Vandal proof & water proof.
8 Channel HD-SDI High Definition DVR with 2TB HDD: 1080P realtime preview, Support Up To 8 Hard Drives, support E-SATA. Support VGA & HDMI Outputs. Support Loop.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
